main event: A lighted object was observed at Scott AFB, Belleville, Illinois on 20 June 1948.
interesting points: The object displayed a zig zag course and had a relatively slow speed, suggesting it was not a fireball or large meteor., The report ruled out astronomical explanations for the sighting., The object was described as resembling a lighted balloon., The incident is recorded as incident #31 in the Project Grudge Report., No photographs were included in the report.
